title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.22 - Confidentiality of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 425.22 - Confidentiality of records

State Regulations

The operator shall keep confidential and make available
only to authorized persons all medical, social, personal and financial
information relating to each registrant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
425.22

Amended by

New

York State Register September 10, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 36, eff. 9/10/2014. Amended and Renumbered from 425.21

New

York State Register March 20, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 12, eff. 3/20/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
